data.title: Cannes Lions Programme 2024
data.meta_description: Make the most out of your time at the Festival with the Agenda tool. Use filters to uncover the most relevant sessions for you, plan your days, avoid any clashes, and see the full line-up of who’s speaking and when.
data.text: This year, icons from across the spectrum of creativity – world-class experts, creators, business leaders, creatives, artists and disruptors – converge at Cannes Lions for a week of sensational, all-new talks. Be part of it – join the Festival 17–21 June.
